https://tmrev.io/movie/40689-Classic Albums: Tom Petty & The Heartbreakers - Damn the Torpedoes 2022-11-27
xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/40689-Classic Albums: Tom Petty & The Heartbreakers - Damn the Torpedoes 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/iebIPh4CQzYAmAMcC9n2G659dI3.jpg The latest addition to Eagle's critically acclaimed and highly successful Classic Albums series is Tom Petty & The Heartbreakers 1979 breakthrough album Damn The Torpedoes . The band s third album defined their musical style and took them into the mainstream hitting No.2 on the US charts and spawning the top 10 single Don t Do Me Like That . The DVD features newly filmed contributions from the band members Tom Petty, Mike Campbell, Benmont Tench, Ron Blair and Stan Lynch along with co-producer Jimmy Iovine and engineer Shelly Yakus as they analyse the tracks from the original multi-track tapes and through new and archive performances. Damn The Torpedoes has stood the test of time as one of the great American rock albums of its era and is a worthy addition to the Classic Albums series. Classic Albums: Tom Petty & The Heartbreakers - Damn the Torpedoes
